metadata.title: Both QFN packages available for the device have an exposed die pad. Is it mandatory to connect it to GND, or can it be left unconnected?

sections.content:
Question:
Both QFN packages available for the device have an exposed die pad. Is it mandatory to connect it to GND, or can it be left unconnected?
Answer:
On this device connecting the exposed die pad is recommended, but not mandatory.
Suitable Products
RISC-V ASSP
